title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Collections
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Collections               Collections         Inside of the Meeks' Store NPS  The museum in the visitor center at Appomattox Court House NHP is not the only place to discover collections sure to intrigue not just Civil War buffs but visitors of every age and interest. In addition to the Wall of Honor in the visitor center and the Parole Passes exhibit in Clover Hill Tavern, collections of historic and cultural artifacts are displayed in the Plunket-Meeks Store and other settings within the village's original and restored structures.
